Class.Name: Manager
Class.Description: A collection of generic design patterns, mostly from the 'Gang of Four' book.

Function.Name: add
Function.Description: Adds an object to the collection

Function.Name: remove
Function.Description: Removes an object from the collection

Function.Name: get
Function.Description: Returns the object identified by a key

Function.Name: set
Function.Description: Adds an object to the collection

Function.Name: find_id
Function.Description: Checks if an object with a key exists. Returns True if found, else False

Function.Name: find_object_id
Function.Description: Finds the key of an object

Function.Name: size
Function.Description: Number of objects in the collection

Function.Name: clear
Function.Description: Removes all objects from the collection

Function.Name: for_each
Function.Description: Iterates through each entity in the collection
